title: Fred Smeijers
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20130922090811/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Designers](http://web.archive.org/web/20130922090811/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Designers) : Fred Smeijers**

Fred Smeijers is a type designer born in the [Netherlands](http://web.archive.org/web/20130922090811/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Netherlands). He has designed typefaces for [FontFont](http://web.archive.org/web/20130922090811/http:/typophile.com/wiki/FontFont), [TEFF](http://web.archive.org/web/20130922090811/http:/typophile.com/wiki/TEFF), [DTL](http://web.archive.org/web/20130922090811/http:/typophile.com/wiki/DTL) and for his own foundry, [OurType](http://web.archive.org/web/20130922090811/http:/typophile.com/wiki/OurType). Apart from his retail-design work, Smeijers designs custom typefaces for clients like Philips and Canon-Europe. Fred Smeijers also published various written works, among them [Counterpunch](http://web.archive.org/web/20130922090811/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Counterpunch) and [Type Now](http://web.archive.org/web/20130922090811/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Type%20Now), both at [HypenPress](http://web.archive.org/web/20130922090811/http:/typophile.com/wiki/HypenPress), London.

Among his typefaces are:  
FF Quadraat  
TEFF Renard  
DTL Nobel  
OT Arnhem  
OT Fresco  
OT Sansa  
OT Custodia  
OT Ludwig

Fred Smeijers is currently Professor for type design and digital media at the [Hochschule für Grafik und Buchkunst](http://web.archive.org/web/20130922090811/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Hochschule%20fuer%20Grafik%20und%20Buchkunst%20) in Leipzig, Germany and visiting professor at Type and Media [KABK](http://web.archive.org/web/20130922090811/http:/typophile.com/wiki/KABK), in The Hague, the [Netherlands](http://web.archive.org/web/20130922090811/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Netherlands).

Next to his type design practice and teaching, Smeijers has a particular interest type history and is currently involved in several research projects.
